body: Another Rotation could be added called Throwback TDM? Maybe?? Just thought of it.
body_tagged: Another Rotation could be added called Throwback TDM? Maybe?? Just thought of it.
title: Throwback TDM rot?

replies.body: TDM is pretty buggy on Avicus and we already have a TDM server that rarely gets played so at this point its not really needed. But just a question to you what maps would be on the server?
replies.body_tagged: TDM is pretty buggy on Avicus and we already have a TDM server that rarely gets played so at this point its not really needed. But just a question to you what maps would be on the server?
